title: Galaxy
description: Ship Fast Website To The User With Just A Sprinkle Of Javascript
fullDescription:
Easiest Way To Start Building Your Project

Galaxy is a template/tech stack for startup or a business. With Astro 1.7v, It provides Server Side Rendering and Static Site Generation for fast UX and it hides the white static page loading with Swup. It already included Prisma ORM, JWT Authentication with email verification and Discord Oauth. 

  • Authentication with Email Verification ( Sendgrid )
  • Discord Oauth
  • SEO friendly
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Prisma with MongoDB
  • Preact ( You can change with anything you want )
